website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot Bebop 2 FPV is an attractive, compact drone for backyard and rural pilots, but it has difficulty with long distance flight in areas with crowded Wi-Fi signals.
pros: Flight app works with Android and iOS
cons: Smartphone or tablet required for camera view

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This drone virtually flies itself. So easy to use. The recorded picture quality is sharp. Yes there are better drones out there but for a heartier price tag. For a beginner you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ian J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for beginners to intermediate!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made! This is my first ever drone, and this is such a beast. It is really fast, and everything about it is good. The only thing that the company could improve on is the application.
customer_reviews.author: Yvan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Connect very easy to the phone app very stable flight easy to control
customer_reviews.author: andrew mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control drone
customer_reviews.text: Control of the drone is excellent, handles the wind. Camera had taken some great video and pictures , footage is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if new or refurbished item. 1 of 2 batteries had a fault when contacted seller through Amazon comms was terrible, seller would not give return address. Gave up trying.
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: You will need a decent USB cable for your phone to the controller
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and set up , we are enjoying this drone to fly and use FPV for the first time , A big thumbs up 👍
customer_reviews.author: A. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone else who had done there research on drones and it didn’t disappoint, give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: paddy

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new toy!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant purchase for the price except for poor quality video
customer_reviews.author: G. T. B. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, very easy to fly, decent camera quality
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Functionality and features are great and user friendliness however the camera came highly out ...
customer_reviews.text: Functionality and features are great and user friendliness however the camera came highly out of focus. For a new product with that kind of price tag one would hope for bettter QC.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mair

product_meta.title: Parrot Bebop 2 Power Drone - Black
product_meta.description:
Bebop 2 Power is a compact drone that is equipped with a quality embedded camera, sophisticated software such as follow me feature and has enhanced battery life. Two power batteries are included which each offer 30 minutes flight time and the pack includes dedicated FPV glasses for truly immersive flight.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Bebop Power 1 x Sky controller 2 Parrot FPV cockpit glasses 4 propellers Power Battery Charger & cable 4 plugs (UK, Europe, America, Asia/Pacific) Propeller mounting tool USB cable 2 power batteries head strap Sky controller charging cable Smartphone & tablet holder Quick start guide
feature_bullets: Up to an hours flight time with two high capacity, 30 minute batteries. Compatible with multiple smartphone brands with screens between 4.7 Inch and 5.5 Inch and width between 6 mm and 9.5 mm
Precise flight and incredible stability with GPS chipset and optical ground positioning system. Wi-Fi and transmissions : Wi-Fi 802,11 a/b/n/ac
Three axis digital image stabilisation technology allows the embedded custom made camera to capture smooth, full HD videos

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars121 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
